quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: You are not your thoughts. You are the observer of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.text: What we think, we become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world throws at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Joy does not simply happen to us. We have to choose joy and keep choosing it every day.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen
quotes.source: The Return of the Prodigal Son
